string-array.name: question_array
string-array.item: What component could be clicked in order to send the user to a new activity?
Which of these is not a feature of heap memory?
Which of these is a process of writing the state of an object to a byte stream?

string-array.name: answer_array2
string-array.item: There is no limit on memory size
Used by all parts of the application

string-array.name: answer_array4
string-array.item: When the application is not responding ANR will occur
When Android forcefully kills an application

string-array.name: correct_answers
string-array.item: When the application is not responding ANR will occur
